title: Leaver buster at leat once in 2 weeks.
body:
hello ! 
So since patch 6.22 i keep getting bug splat's at least 2/3 times a day.
If i am unlucky, and my team surrender while i have a bug splat, i do get a leaver buster.
Also after every patch, there is 'data corruption' notification, the same day i installed the patch or the next day.
I never rage quit a game, or afk on purpose. I play till the game is over.
So is there an option to prove to riot, it's not my fault i afk ? 
Because 'data corruption' and 'bug splat' is not my fault at all. But i still get the punishment.(leaver buster)

replies.body: Even if the leaves aren't intentional, they still cause others a negative experience for being down a player.  I'd like to help you get this figured out to prevent further penalties and keep you in game.  The issue you're having may be due to both bad game files as well as outdated drivers, so I recommend using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for the resolution.  I hope it helps!
